EmailTemplate.description: Email to Approver when timesheet has been submitted for approval
EmailTemplate.name: Timesheet Details Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Timesheet Approval Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!TR1__Timesheet__c.TR1__Approver_First_Name__c},
You have timesheets that are awaiting your approval.
Please log in to the Supply Desk Community and approve the timesheets as soon as possible for the week ending {!TR1__Timesheet__c.TR1__Week_Ending__c}.
Kind Regards,
Supply Desk
